experiences.title: Full-stack Developer
experiences.description:
As a Full Stack Developer at ECA Assurances, I develop, maintain, and optimize key web-based projects, including our CRM system and OCR solutions. I work with Laravel, Vue.js, Python, Go, and Flask to deliver efficient and scalable applications, pushing updates and managing production deployments. 

A significant achievement in my role was stabilizing the CRM project and reducing database costs by 50% through strategic refactoring. I also implemented a materialized design pattern to optimize hierarchical data retrieval, which significantly improved performance. Additionally, I integrated Grafana and Prometheus into our projects to detect bottlenecks and monitor application behavior in production. 

While officially a developer, I provide technical guidance across teams, helping to debug issues and propose solutions that enhance project efficiency.
